cause.description:
Every day people around the world suffer needlessly, through no fault of their own. Many die from diseases that are already curable, simply because they live in a developing country where the proper treatment is not available, or they cannot afford the medical expenses. Everyone Needs a Hero is a non-profit organization, formed in April 2004, dedicated to improving the lives of the disadvantaged, one story at a time.
Here's our website:
www.EveryoneNeedsaHero.org
1. Everyone deserves a chance at life, irrespective of where they were born.
2. Those of us who have the ability to help those without those assets should help them.
3. Anyone can be a hero.
cause.mission: Improve the lives of the disadvantaged worldwide, one story at a time
cause.name: Everyone Needs a Hero
